data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,213,400 citizens of the the state of Sóc Trăng.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sóc Trăng, Vietnam

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Sóc Trăng, Vietnam to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 26,245 believers living in Sóc Trăng, Vietnam.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Sóc Trăng, Vietnam, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Indonesian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
God, we pray for the believers in Sóc Trăng, Vietnam that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sóc Trăng, Vietnam to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sóc Trăng, Vietnam has a population of 1,213,400.

We estimate Sóc Trăng has 26,245 people who might know Jesus, 97,330 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,089,825 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sóc Trăng who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
